title: Orca
summaries: The Shark is an enemy found in the Ocean. Sharks are rarer than other Ocean enemies like Crabs or Pink Jellyfish, though they are still relatively common.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, a variant of the Shark known as the Orca can be found in the Ocean. Despite their differences in name, sprite, and stats, the Shark and Orca have the same behavior.

statistics.Banner: [img:Orca Banner]Orca Banner(Old-gen console version)
